A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is absolute drivel. It’s almost as if someone sat down and said “hmmm\, how can I ruin everything great and iconic about Star Wars” and Disney was like “fuck yeah\, make that movie.” This is an absolute piece of SHIT - excessively cheesy (ghost of jar-jar came back to write this bs)\, completely neutered (built up to so many moments that could have been great but didn’t do anything)\, and it recycled so many moments. Save your money\, don’t go see this drivel.
